General.Name: Softline AG
General.Description: Softline AG provides IT consulting services in Germany. It offers software and IT asset management, IT service management, cloud spend optimization, software asset management managed services, managed trustcenter services, identity and access management, hardware-based security systems, information security and data protection, information and IT security, cloud transformation, cloud architecture and optimization, cloud migration and integration, cloud security, softline managed cloud, future datacenter, digital workplace, unified communications, system management, managed cloud and DC, and recruiting services. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Leipzig, Germany.
